TravelPlanner: A Benchmark for Real-World Planning with Language Agents
list: Feb 2024, Google Real World Journeys Group

data.name: Task Alignment in Instruction-tuned LLMs for Relation Extraction (LLM-QA4RE)
list: Mar 2023, University of Notre Dame NLP Seminar

data.content: MagicLens and TravelPlanner were accepted to ICML'24.
Excited to present MagicLens done at Google DeepMind: next-generation image retrieval models with SOTA results on 10 benchmarks across multimodality-to-image, image-to-image, and text-to-image.
MMMU was accepted to CVPR'24 as Oral (0.78%) and I will be in MSR this summer. See you in Seattle :)
Released TravelPlanner, a real-world benchmark for planning with language agents.
Three papers got accpeted to ICLR'24: KnowledgeConflict (Spotlight), MUFFIN, and ImagenHub.
Attribution Evaluation was accepted to Findings of EMNLP'23.
MagicBrush was accepted to NeurIPS'23 Datasets and Benchmarks Track.
Excited to start my internship at Google DeepMind (Previously Google Brain)!

Page.title: about
Page._content:
Hi, I'm Kai Zhang

I'm a second-year PhD student fortunately advised by Prof.Yu Su at The Ohio State University.

I'm broadly interested in NLP, Multimodality, and their real-world applications. Here is my (could be outdated) CV.

Find me on , , and .

# Selected Publications See full list in [Publications](/archives).

  • MagicLens: Self-Supervised Image Retrieval with Open-Ended Instructions

    Kai Zhang, Yi Luan, Hexiang Hu, Kenton Lee, Siyuan Qiao, Wenhu Chen, Yu Su, Ming-Wei Chang

    Preprint ArXiv Website

  • MMMU: A Massive Multi-discipline Multimodal Understanding and Reasoning Benchmark for Expert AGI

    Xiang Yue*, Yuansheng Ni*, Kai Zhang*, Tianyu Zheng*, Ruoqi Liu, Ge Zhang, Samuel Stevens, Dongfu Jiang, Weiming Ren, Yuxuan Sun, Cong Wei, Botao Yu, Ruibin Yuan, Renliang Sun, Ming Yin, Boyuan Zheng, Zhenzhu Yang, Yibo Liu, Wenhao Huang, Huan Sun, Yu Su, Wenhu Chen

    CVPRâ€™24 Oral(0.78%) ArXiv Website Code Data

  • Adaptive Chameleon or Stubborn Sloth: Revealing the Behavior of Large Language Models in Knowledge Conflicts

    Jian Xie*, Kai Zhang*, Jiangjie Chen, Renze Lou, Yu Su

    ICLRâ€™24 Spotlight (5%) ArXiv Code

  • MagicBrush: A Manually Annotated Dataset for Instruction-Guided Image Editing

    Kai Zhang*, Lingbo Mo*, Wenhu Chen, Huan Sun, Yu Su

    NeurIPSâ€™23 Datasets and Benchmarks ArXiv Website Code Data

# Invited Talks

Large Language Models in Knowledge Conflicts Slides

  • Mar 2024, AI Time Seminar

    • TravelPlanner: A Benchmark for Real-World Planning with Language Agents Slides

  • Feb 2024, Google Real World Journeys Group

    • Task Alignment in Instruction-tuned LLMs for Relation Extraction (LLM-QA4RE) Slides

  • Mar 2023, University of Notre Dame NLP Seminar
  • May 2023, AI TIME Seminar
  • Jul 2023, ACLâ€™23 Matching Workshop
    • # PC Member/Reviewer: ARR (since 22); CCKSâ€™22-23; EMNLPâ€™22-23; ACLâ€™23; NAACLâ€™24 WWWâ€™23; KDDâ€™23; SDMâ€™24 AAAIâ€™23-24; NeurIPSâ€™23; ICLRâ€™24; ICMLâ€™24; COLMâ€™24 CVPRâ€™24 # Contact **Email**: [LAST_NAME].13253@osu.edu OR drogo[LAST_NAME]@gmail.com Feel free to contact me if you are interested in my research or want to discuss relevant research topic :)

Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)
Post.raw:

title: Hello World
---
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)
